sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export const WeatherData = ({ data }) => { const { name, country, temp, description, temp_min, temp_max, icon, feels_like, speed, deg, humidity } = data; return ( <>
{Weekday}, {Month} {Day}

{name}, {country}

{description}

Feels like {feels_like} 째

{temp}째

H {temp_max}째
L {temp_min}째

{DegreesToDirection(deg)} {speed} KPH

{humidity} %

); }
